response.overview: A simple mixing bowl becomes the stage for a magical recipe in a whimsical world where ingredients are feelings and memories. As playful hands animate eggs into pom-poms, colours swirl from mugs, and flowers rain hearts, a unique cake begins to take shape. Words of gratitude fall gently into the bowl, and with a final wave of a magic wand, a rainbow signals the cake’s completion. Slices are shared, and crumbs remain — a celebration of creativity, memory, and joy.
response.title: The Dream Cake
